refnamediv.refname: Making an XML element with attribute, a text content and a sublement
refnamediv.refpurpose: XML element with attribute, a text content and a sublement

refsect1.title: Example 4
refsect1.para: This example shows a use of the XMLELEMENT() for creating the xml element 'Employee' with the 'EmployeeID' attribute, text content that is concatenations of the value of the 'FirstName' column, of the blank character and of the value of the 'LastName', and the 'Title' subelement having 'title' attribute.
